SHOPITEM.PRODUCTNAME: Seven Days of Us - Francesca Hornak
SHOPITEM.PRODUCT: Seven Days of Us - Francesca Hornak
SHOPITEM.DESCRIPTION: It’s Christmas, and for the first time in years the entire Birch family will be under one roof. Even Emma and Andrew’s elder daughter—who is usually off saving the world—will be joining them at Weyfield Hall, their aging country estate.
